## Take-Home message

### Prevalence Context
 
Methods for freedom from infection can be adopted to each particular context

* Absence of infection is known/suspected: Scenario tree method 

Simulations based on hypotheses

* Presence of infection is known/suspected: Bayesian hierarchical true prevalence estimation, STOC free model 

Bayesian Inference
